definition: to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Compared with the TFP, the role of labor capital accumulation are more prominent.
sentences.chinese: 与TFP相比而言，劳均资本积累的作用更为突出。

sentences.english: The results indicate that using standard grade to arrange is better. Also, the concrete method is given in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出用标准分排序更为合理，并给出具体做法。

sentences.english: He has a better eye for similarities among cultures than for diversities.
sentences.chinese: 他看各种文化之间的相似点比看其相异点更为透彻。

sentences.english: This makes writing document-processing applications much simpler.
sentences.chinese: 这样使得文档处理应用程序的编写更为简单。

sentences.english: That has since calmed down and the markets have gotten even quieter lately.
sentences.chinese: 此后市场逐渐平静下来，最近已变得更为平静了。

sentences.english: It's easier to drink with no fishy taste .
sentences.chinese: 去除了鱼类原有的鱼腥味，变得更为容易饮用。

sentences.english: However, it's more polite than a direct request.
sentences.chinese: 但是，比起直接的询问，这是一种更为礼貌的请求。

sentences.english: Making dead wood more blessed than living lips.
sentences.chinese: 使枯木比活生生的双唇更为幸福。

sentences.english: The more modern face of China reasserts itself a few hours later in the district of Kundu.
sentences.chinese: 中国更为现代的面貌在昆都数小时后再次体现。

sentences.english: It seemed more new-user-friendly that way.
sentences.chinese: 这看起来对新用户来说更为友好。

sentences.english: In China, respect for your elders, for your forbears , is even more important than making money.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，尊敬老人和列祖列宗要比赚钱更为重要。

sentences.english: The political rally was souped up by the appearance of the candidates.
sentences.chinese: 这次政治集会由于各候选人的出席而显得更为热闹。

sentences.english: Beral thinks a more interesting candidate for study is prolactin .
sentences.chinese: 贝拉尔认为，一个更为有趣的研究课题是泌乳刺激素。

sentences.english: Heavy Armourer can significantly improve the armour available to new and retrained units.
sentences.chinese: 重甲工坊可以为军队提供更为精良的盔甲。

sentences.english: It's a contrast that grows more stark when seen through the eyes of history.
sentences.chinese: 这种对比在历史的视角下更为了然。

sentences.english: It’s no doubt that Black Friday will be busier this year than it ever has been.
sentences.chinese: 毋容置疑，今年的黑色星期五将会更为繁忙。

definition: to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
